ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views

Class SetExpenseLocationActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views.MenuActivity
        • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views.SetExpenseLocationActivity

  • public class SetExpenseLocationActivity
extends MenuActivity
    Allows the user to pick a spot on a map to be able to save it as the new expense location. If a location is passed to this activity as two intents, one latitude and one longitude, then it is displayed as the previous location
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SetExpenseLocationActivity() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void goCurrent(View v)
      Called when prev button is clicked, the map goes to previous expense location if one was passed to the activity as an intent
      void goToGps(View v)
      Called when GPS is clicked, the map goes to current gps location

      Called when the activity is created.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SetExpenseLocationActivity

        public SetExpenseLocationActivity()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Called when the activity is created. Sets up the map and adds a marker if a location was passed as intents to the activity. A listener is also made for long clicks on spots on the map that sets a marker and the spot long clicked on as the new location.

      • goCurrent

        public void goCurrent(View v)
        Called when prev button is clicked, the map goes to previous expense location if one was passed to the activity as an intent
        Parameters:
        v - the current view

      • goToGps

        public void goToGps(View v)
        Called when GPS is clicked, the map goes to current gps location
        Parameters:
        v - the current view

      • saveLocation

        public void saveLocation(View v)
        Called when save new location is clicked. Saves the location that is set using the map by passing the new location back to the activity that called it as an intent
        Parameters:
        v - the current view
